com.mr.http.ssl

类 MR_HurlStack

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mr.http.ssl.MR_HurlStack
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    MR_HttpStack

    public class MR_HurlStack
extends java.lang.Object
implements MR_HttpStack
    An MR_HttpStack based on HttpURLConnection.

    • 嵌套类概要

      An interface for transforming URLs before use.

    • 方法详细资料

      • performRequest

        public HttpResponse performRequest(MR_Request<?> request,
                          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> additionalHeaders)
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   MR_AuthFailureError
        从接口复制的说明: MR_HttpStack
        Performs an HTTP request with the given parameters.

        A GET request is sent if request.getPostBody() == null. A POST request is sent otherwise, and the Content-Type header is set to request.getPostBodyContentType().

        指定者:
        performRequest 在接口中 MR_HttpStack
        参数:
        request - the request to perform
        additionalHeaders - additional headers to be sent together with MR_Request.getHeaders()
        返回:
        the HTTP response
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
        MR_AuthFailureError
